name: Dont press the button (Ryan_jimenez)
description:
Welcome this is my first game jam game and if you would test it that would be appreciated

them of the game jam was procrastination 

i made this game is less than 40 mins i recorded some of me making the game on my YouTube channel i will upload the video soon

Note: the game is completely free but any donation is very much appreciated   

Game bio: the game is just a don't press the button you can speed run leaving as fast as you can and tweet me a clip of how fast you got
